items.title: EasyLab
items.text:
EasyLab is a platform that helps you manage your lab environments.

As an admin (trainer, speaker, ...), you have access to the admin space to manager your labs.

Go to Admin documentation

For your students, they can access the student space to request a new development environment or to retrieve information about their environments.

Go to Student documentation

items.title: Admin Space
items.text: As an admin (trainer, speaker, ...), you have access to the admin space to manager your labs.

items.title: Labs List
items.text: The labs list is the main page of the admin space. It displays the list of labs you have created.

items.title: Student Space
items.text: As a student, you have access to the student space to request a new development environment or to retrieve information about your environments.

items.title: Request a new development environment
items.text: The request a new development environment page is the main page of the student space. It allows you to request a new development environment.
